analysis: The project is a web application with a basic HTML structure and CSS styling. The event.json indicates a need for an Egyptian-themed, light color, desert, mobile-responsive, and clean UI. The current files need to be updated to reflect these themes and ensure all buttons work properly.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file with an Egyptian-themed color palette, including light desert colors like sandy beige, gold, and turquoise. Ensure the design is clean and mobile-responsive.
Ensure all buttons in the HTML file are functional and styled according to the Egyptian theme. Add any missing button elements if necessary.
Update the JavaScript file to ensure all buttons are interactive and responsive. Implement any necessary event listeners for button functionality.
